# ||(_:_:)

**Operator**

Creates a column of Booleans by performing a logical OR operation on each element in the first column with the corresponding element in the second column.

## Declaration

```swift
static func || (a: MLDataColumn<Bool>, b: MLDataColumn<Bool>) -> MLDataColumn<Bool>
```

## Parameters

- **a**: A column of Booleans.
- **b**: A column of Booleans.

## Return Value

A new column of Booleans if the columns are the same size; otherwise an invalid column.

## Combining columns of booleans to generate a column of booleans

- **&&(_:_:)**: Creates a column of Booleans by performing a logical AND operation on each element in the first column with the corresponding element in the second column.

items.description: Creates a column of Booleans by performing a logical AND operation on each element in the first column with the corresponding element in the second column.
